name: Frighten Fight
description:
This is my first time making this game. 

This  game designing concept is that I want to play this game's gamer enable to remind gamer's childhood. The most naive and  easiest game. Even though this game might really short, you also want to play again.

Please comment below whether you like this game or not. Or how can I improve it. I really need more feedback, thank you.

 Hope you like it, and enjoying the game!

Control Method: 

1. Using "w", "a", "s", "d" to control up, left ,down and right.

2.Using mouse to shoot and kill enemy.

Aim: Killing 30 enemies to escape this cave.
